item.title: Build a Complete React App
item.description: Concepts Use Component Composition (stateful and presentational components) Work with the React useEffect hook to fetch data from an API Work with react-router to create routes and navigate between views Introduction Now that we have covered all of the fundamentals of React, we are going to build a complete client-side application that makes use of the following:
